Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an IV/nonce is not provided
        for the symmetric decryption algorithm.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = (enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.AES,
    b'\x00\x01\x02\x03\x04\x05\x06\x07\x08\t\n\x0b\x0c\r\x0e\x0f',
    b'\x0f\x0e\r\x0c\x0b\n\t\x08\x07\x06\x05\x04\x03\x02\x01\x00')
kwargs = {'cipher_mode': enums.BlockCipherMode.CBC, 'padding_method': enums
    .PaddingMethod.PKCS5}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField, 'IV/nonce is required.',
    engine.decrypt, *args, **kwargs)
